none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on January 02, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
Seven minutes filled with whirling riffs and howling fastcore burners. These shits dominated the landscape in the early '00s....and these five cuts from 2013 makes it easy to see why. I like hardcore punk music.  SHINY BROWN
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-14zO_nXZobY/Xg4AAPQdDZI/AAAAAAAAWWE/cegBRLzioqg1DSzS_J31tx_Tgf5jp7JMgCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/Shiny%2BBrown%2Bfront%2Bcopy.jpg https://shinybrown.bandcamp.com/
